bug.author: Fizunimo
bug.summary: The program is aborted maybe because of thread.
bug.description: After running detect.py with "python3 detect.py --source 0" and pressing q to exit, it becomes "terminate called without an active exception" and "aborted" or "fatal exception not rethrown" and "aborted". This is thought to be a problem caused by Thread. Is there any solution?

comments.comment: --source 0 is a webcam source. It is meant to run forever untill the q or escape key is pressed, or you can also kill the thread with ctrl c
